description: This file defines a ViewModel class `PaletteViewModel` responsible for coordinating color palette generation and exposing UI state via LiveData. It manages interactions with a palette generator and debouncer, handles asynchronous generation using coroutines, and maintains observable properties for palette data, loading state, and duration.

classes.name: PaletteViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel that manages palette generation, loading states, and duration measurement, using LiveData and coroutines for asynchronous operations.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Initiates palette generation asynchronously, handling debounce, timing, and updating LiveData properties.
